Enkephalin has been fully recharged.

Take notice, yet naught is odd here. Ideally, my only purpose here would be to inform you that Enkephalin is replenished fully. Such is all I have to say.
Enkephalin Charged
Enkephalin recharge is complete. Dear manager, Enkephalin module conversion is recommended for the sake of efficiency.
Enkephalin Charged
MANAGER ESQUIRE!!! THE FUEL TANK HATH BEEN REFILLED!!! COME HITHER, FOR OUR ADVENTURES MUST GO ON!!!

Enkephalin has been fully recharged, manager.
Enkephalin Charged
Woow~ Enkephalin's already fully charged~ Would you like to go check?
Enkephalin Charged
The, uh. Enkeph—? ... The green stuff's full. Go take a gander, yeah?
Enkephalin Charged
Enkephalin's been recharged... Hm. Yeah, the bus is ready for another voyage. Let's go.
Enkephalin Charged
Dante~ Enkephalin's charged! Don'tcha forget to convert 'em to modules!
Enkephalin Charged
Hi, manager... are you... busy? I-it's nothing too serious, but... Enkephalin's about to overflow...
Enkephalin Charged
Reporting to the Executive Manager. Enkephalin has been fully replenished. May I suggest that you use or convert them?
Enkephalin Charged
Uhh, manager bud? You there? The, uh, the bus fuel tank is full... Might wanna come check?
Enkephalin Charged
Your break is over, manager Dante. Don't keep the bus sitting for too long.
Enkephalin Charged
Mephi's stuffed. Charon, time to vroom-vroom.
